msg: - When caching is disabled, the saved request wasn't used.

author: remm
msg: - Fix two tests after Jasper changes.

author: mturk
msg: Change to the absolute path using %CD% for setting CATALINA_HOME.
This enables that java.io.tempdir  is set to absolute path instead relative.

author: jfarcand
msg: Fix bugtraq : javax.naming.NamingException after a Stop/Start cycle of a web app
Using jmx, if you stop/start the Context, listener and applicationListeners are removed when calling stop and never re-added.
